Posts.EditableText: I'm looking to create a timer that will keep track of days, hours and minutes, each turn taking 5 minutes of game time. I would also like to display this on the status line. The timer is in seconds, would I have to do the math and write a script for that, or is there an easier way?
Posts.HTML: I'm looking to create a timer that will keep track of days, hours and minutes, each turn taking 5 minutes of game time. I would also like to display this on the status line. The timer is in seconds, would I have to do the math and write a script for that, or is there an easier way?
